content.query:
-- Create and load DimDate table
-- A dimension table focused on date attributes.
-- Provides date details like year, month, day, quarter,
-- and week, along with names for days and months, and a weekend indicator.

CREATE TABLE DimDate (
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

-- Populate DimDate Table from ExternalBluebike
INSERT INTO DimDate (
    date, year, month, day,
    quarter, week, day_of_week, 
    day_name, month_name, is_weekend
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(started_at AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, started_at) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, started_at) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, started_at) AS day,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, started_at) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, started_at) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, started_at) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, started_at) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, started_at) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, started_at) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM
    ExternalBluebike;
GO
